fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
The effects of Lemonade (461), Grape Juice (450), and Limeade (455) are in play until someone plays cards of those colors before your next turn ( <:yellow:1106234135384699023> <:lime:1108048230542999633> <:purple:1106247148607131711> ).
- Gain 1 **Happy** ğŸ˜ƒ when an effect is used.
 - If all 3 effects are down before your turn, you may add 2 of <:yellow:1106234135384699023>, <:partisan:1107460550268559380>, <:slightlylightergreenbutwithalitt:1120008660454744117>, ğŸ¸, <:lime:1108048230542999633>, or <:purple:1106247148607131711> to up to 3 cards in your hand.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:orange:1106716206905438231> + <:slightlylightergreenbutwithalitt:1120008660454744117> ):
fields.value:
The effects of Lemonade (461), Kool-Aid (460), Orange Juice (467), Grape Juice (450), and Limeade (455) are in play until someone plays cards of one of those colors ( <:red:1106234051129507932> <:orange:1106716206905438231> <:yellow:1106234135384699023> <:lime:1108048230542999633> <:purple:1106247148607131711> ). Once that happens, the effects will be in play until you take 2 turns.
- Gain 1 **Happy** ğŸ˜ƒ when an effect is used.
 - If 3 effects are down before your turn, you may add 3 of <:yellow:1106234135384699023>, <:partisan:1107460550268559380>, <:slightlylightergreenbutwithalitt:1120008660454744117>, ğŸ¸, <:lime:1108048230542999633>, or <:purple:1106247148607131711> to up to 3 cards in your hand.
 - If 4 effects are down, gain 2 <:partisan:1107460550268559380>.
 - If 5 effects are down, discard 7 cards.
